this_title: Mange tes morts – Tu ne diras point
introduction: Eighteen-year-old Jason Dorkel belongs to the traveller community. He is getting ready to celebrate his Christian baptism when his half-brother Fred returns after several years in prison. Together with their last brother, the impulsive and violent Mickael, the three Dorkels set off for a spin in the world of the “gadjos” in search of a cargo of copper.
chinese_title: Mange tes morts – Tu ne diras point
